A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was what I hoped to be the redeeming soul of this great franchise. Instead I'm dragged through all the things that made me hate the last 4 films excluding Rouge One. Gimpy CGI\, random characters that pop up with no real redeeming qualities that try to steal the spotlight\, and cliffhangers that end with a flop instead of well tied in story. Let's not forget the insufferable Mary-Sue and the continued bastardized version of the force that keeps hanging about like a sentient ghost instead of a force that connects all things. A major disappointment and failing to the Star Wars community.
